ctx: induction A as [| [x y] A IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : list nat A : list (card nat) IH : tau2 A <<= (fix sym R : list nat := match R with | [] => [] | (x, y) :: R0 => x ++ y ++ sym R0 end) A H : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 m : list A), l1 ++ l2 <<= m -> l2 <<= m H0 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 m : list A), l1 ++ l2 <<= m -> l1 <<= m a : nat Unable to unify "a el x" with "a el y".

ctx: induction A as [| [x y] A IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment H1 : forall R (u v : list nat), (u, v) el R -> u <<= sym R x, y : list nat A : list (card nat) IH : tau2 A <<= (fix sym R : list nat := match R with | [] => [] | (x, y) :: R0 => x ++ y ++ sym R0 end) A H : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 m : list A), l1 ++ l2 <<= m -> l2 <<= m H0 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 m : list A), l1 ++ l2 <<= m -> l1 <<= m Unable to unify "tau2 A <<= (fix sym R : list nat := match R with | [] => [] | (x, y) :: R0 => x ++ y ++ sym R0 end) A" with "y <<= x".

original: unfold sym. intros. induction A as [| [x y] A IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. apply incl_app_inv in H. destruct H. apply incl_tran with (m:=x++y). apply incl_app_l. apply sym_word_l with (u:=x)(v:=y). auto. apply IH. auto.
